SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers.impl

Class JctCompilationImpl.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers.impl.JctCompilationImpl.Builder
Enclosing class:
JctCompilationImpl
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public static final class JctCompilationImpl.Builder extends Object
Builder type for a JctCompilationImpl to simplify initialization.

This builder object must not be built more than once.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes
